original_text: So it was Moses who led the people of Israel out of Egypt. He did some powerful things before the people left Egypt. This showed that God was with him. He did more miracles at the Red Sea. Then he led the people through the wilderness for 40 years. He also did more miracles there.
korean_text: 이 사람이 백성을 인도하여 나오게 하고 애굽과 홍해와 광야에서 사십 년간 기사와 표적을 행하였느니라

sentences.original_text: So it was Moses who led the people of Israel out of Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이집트에서 이스라엘 백성을 이끌어 낸 사람은 모세였습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did some powerful things before the people left Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백성들이 이집트를 떠나기 전에 강력한 일들을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: This showed that God was with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님이 그와 함께 계심을 보여주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did more miracles at the Red Sea.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 홍해에서 더 많은 기적들을 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he led the people through the wilderness for 40 years.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 그는 백성들을 이끌고 40년 동안 광야를 지났습니다.

sentences.original_text: He also did more miracles there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에서 또한 더 많은 기적들을 행했습니다.
